actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-208.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #243 (399-4).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 1386 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the saline water program for fiscal year 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes to be appropriated $9,127,000 during fiscal year 1974 to carry out the provisions of the Saline Water Conversion Act of 1971. Specifies the allotment of such funds among the Act's programs. Limits administrative discretion to transfer funds among the various programs under the Act by establishing percentage maximums on amounts transferrable. Authorizes such additional amounts as necessary for increases in salary, pay, retirement, or other employee benefits authorized by law.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the saline water program for fiscal year 1974, and for other purposes.
